basics.name: Bryan Alejandro Castro
basics.label: Full Stack & Mobile Developer with over 3 years of experience
basics.summary: +3 years of experience as a Software Developer. Currently, I am a Frontend & Mobile Developer at MyCodedMind. I live in Cuenca, Ecuador. I have worked in various environments: from mobile application development and deployment, web systems, to the creation of REST APIs, using different technologies.

work.name: MyCodedMind
work.summary: We use the SCRUM methodology for project development. I specialize in developing mobile applications for Android and iOS using technologies like Flutter, Angular, RxJS, Ionic, Capacitor, and TypeScript. My responsibilities include implementing applications on Google Play and the App Store, maintaining and updating legacy code, and integrating various tools and platforms, including Google Cloud Console, Google Analytics, Firebase, Facebook SDK, in-app purchases, AppleID, Stripe, and push and local notifications.

work.name: bryancastro.dev
work.summary: Develop applications and websites for various clients, tailored to their needs and specifications, using a variety of technologies. For mobile development, I use React Native, Capacitor, Ionic, and Flutter. For web development, I work with ReactJS, Angular, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and NodeJS. For desktop development, I use ElectronJS. Additionally, I incorporate Firebase, MySQL, and MongoDB for other functionalities.

work.name: NativApps
work.summary: Made several fixes to the Oh! Foodie app, including adjustments and fixes in authentication with AppleID and Google Auth. Managed the project in Firebase, fixed bugs in the app's UI, and handled compilation and deployment in test environments on the Apple Store and Google Play.

work.name: Proguercom C.A
work.summary: Developed and maintained CUUPOM, a discount coupons app for iOS and Android, primarily using React Native. This involved integrating tools like Firebase (FireStore, FirebaseAuth), Google Cloud (Google Auth), and Facebook SDK. Additionally, developed web applications using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, and Firebase.

work.name: Instituto Superior Tecnológico José Ochoa León
work.summary: Participated in the layout and development of the informational website for the Instituto Superior Tecnológico 'José Ochoa León', using technologies such as HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, and JavaScript.

projects.name: Fundación FUNCAA
projects.description: Informational and manageable website for the Fundación Corazón de Amor en Acción.

projects.name: The Aroma Trace
projects.description: Update and maintenance of the main application, The Aroma Trace

projects.name: Benítez on the Road
projects.description: Application to view and book vehicles from Benitez Chrysler Humacao.

projects.name: AudioStories
projects.description: Audiobook application promoting Ecuadorian classic literature

projects.name: Oh! Foodie
projects.description: Application that allows users to view restaurant information, dishes, location, and reservations.

projects.name: VibesOn - Sharing economy App
projects.description: Collaborative economy app that connects hosts and attendees, allowing discovery of exclusive parties and experiences
